ctr_optimization.creature_visibility: Partial reveal (silhouette, eyes, blurred) to create mystery
ctr_optimization.scale_contrast: Juxtapose massive creatures against tiny subjects (human silhouettes, submarines)
ctr_optimization.subject_position: Rule of Thirds intersections or centered; 40-50% of frame
ctr_optimization.camera_framing: Tight crop or extreme close-up on faces/eyes
ctr_optimization.contrast_ratio: Minimum 4.5:1; use shadows or bright borders to separate subject
ctr_optimization.color_palette: Deep blues/blacks + neon accents (Cyan/Teal/Orange); red for urgency
ctr_optimization.background_simplicity: High simplicity (empty abyss or blurred); max 3 elements total

text_rules.placement: Upper-left or top-right; AVOID bottom-right timestamp zone

ctr_optimization.mobile_check: Must be legible at 120p-150p width (70% of views are mobile)
